turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing and what kind of coffee are you trying to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you'd like those drinks hot, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and do you have a preference for milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, did you say fat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks has the following options Whole Nonfat, 2% Soy Coconut Almond.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want any syrups or sweeteners in your drinks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. So you want 2 cappuccinos using coconut milk from starbucks in riverside.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place the order right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drinks have been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!
